Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains the tenanted Job Profile for the Workday Job Profile.
If Workday Job Profile Not Applicable is set to true, the Workday Job Profile won't map to tenanted Job Profiles.

Workday_Job_Profile_Not_Applicable.description: If Workday Job Profile Not Applicable is set to true, the Workday Job Profile won't map to tenanted Job Profiles.
